subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=85|rad=水|as=14|sn=17|canj=EOMB|four=|ids=⿰氵𠎤}}

# (same as non-classical abbreviated form of [[瀹]]) to boil
# to wash, to cleanse, to soak
# to cook, to stew, to decoct
# to channel
# to enlighten
# to clean or dredge (a waterway)
# water currents
